title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" - the perfect travel companion for your next adventure! This small size 21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage is not only extremely lightweight, but also stylish and durable. Made with a high-quality ABS hard shell and a smooth steel rod, this suitcase is built to last.

With a capacity of 33L, you'll have plenty of space to pack everything you need for a 1-3 day trip. The 360 degree silent double spinner wheels allow for easy maneuverability on any type of ground, making it a breeze to navigate through airports or busy streets. Plus, the TSA lock ensures that your belongings are safe and secure during your travels.

Not only is this luggage practical, but it's also designed with elegance in mind. The textured finish prevents scratches, keeping your case looking beautiful even after multiple trips. The stainless steel pull rod can be adjusted to three different lengths, providing added convenience.

Inside, you'll find an organized and secure interior with a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps to keep your belongings in place. No more rummaging through your suitcase to find what you need - everything will be neatly organized and easily accessible.

Available in a range of vibrant colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, you can choose the perfect suitcase to match your personal style. Whether you're traveling, camping, going on a business trip, or heading back to school, the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" is the ultimate travel companion. Don't miss out on this must-have luggage set - get yours today and fully enjoy your journey!

Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage, the perfect companion for all your travel adventures! This small size 21" carry-on hardside suitcase is not only incredibly lightweight, but also incredibly stylish. Made with a durable ABS hard shell and a smooth steel rod, this luggage is built to withstand the rigors of travel. 

With a spacious 33L capacity, you'll have plenty of room to pack all your essentials for a 1-3 day trip. The suitcase features a 360 degree silent double spinner wheels system, allowing for easy maneuverability on any type of ground. Whether you're navigating through crowded airports or rolling along uneven streets, this luggage will glide effortlessly by your side. 

For added security, there is a TSA lock on the side of the luggage, ensuring that your belongings are safe and secure throughout your journey. The elegant and practical design of this luggage is truly a standout feature. The textured finish not only adds a touch of sophistication, but also prevents against scratches, keeping your case looking beautiful trip after trip. 

The interior of this suitcase is organized and secure, with an interior mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps to keep your belongings in place. Plus, the squared full-capacity design maximizes packing space, so you can fit everything you need without any hassle. 

Available in a range of vibrant colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, you can choose the perfect shade to suit your style. 

Don't let heavy luggage weigh you down on your travels. Choose the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage and experience the ultimate in lightweight convenience and style. Start your journey today!

The Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage is the perfect travel companion for your next adventure. Whether you're traveling, camping, going on a business trip, or heading back to school, this lightweight and durable suitcase is designed to make your journey easier.

Constructed with a strong ABS hard shell and a smooth steel rod, this luggage is built to withstand the rigors of travel. The 33L capacity provides ample space to pack everything you need for a 1-3 day trip. Safety is a top priority, which is why this suitcase is equipped with a TSA lock on the side. Your belongings will be secure and protected throughout your journey. This high-quality luggage is made of 100% ABS material, making it impact-resistant, scratch-resistant, and lightweight. Weighing only 5.62 lbs, it is the perfect choice for short trips and business travel. The four silent and smooth multi-directional spinner wheels can handle a height of 1 meter and a weight of 60lb without breaking, ensuring durability and longevity.

Comfort is key, which is why this suitcase features a TPR soft handle with a straight handle design for a comfortable grip when you need to carry it. The stainless steel pull rod can be adjusted to three different lengths, allowing you to customize it to your preferred height.

Stay organized with the interior mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps, ensuring your belongings stay in place during travel. The squared full-capacity design maximizes packing space, so you can bring everything you need without sacrificing organization.

Choose the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage and embark on your next adventure with confidence and style. Enjoy the journey with this reliable and fashionable travel companion.

The suitcase is equipped with 360 degree silent double spinner wheels for easy maneuver on different kind of ground. And there is also a TSA lock on the side of the luggage to ensure your belongs is safe to travel with you. You can fully enjoy the journey with these travel luggage sets!

* Top material for every part; 4x Silent & Smooth Multi-directional Spinner Wheels Can accept a height of 1 meter and a weight of 60lb without breakage; TPR soft handle with straight handle makes you more comfortable when you need to carry.
* Elegant + Practical Design; Features textured finish to prevent against scratches, keeping case beautiful after a trip. Stainless steels pull rod can be adjusted for three lengths.
* Organized & Secure Interior; Interior mesh zip pocket and elasticated, Squared full-capacity design, Capacity : 33L
